skill.name: executing-plans
skill.description: Use when you have a written implementation plan to execute in a separate session with review checkpoints
skill.summary: Use when you have a written implementation plan to execute in a separate session with review checkpo...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only markdown instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or cryptographic operations. The static scanner falsely flagged metadata fields (source_url, content_hash, text strings) as security threats. All findings are false positives. Safe for publication.

content.value_statement: Complex implementations require careful step-by-step execution with human oversight. This skill provides a structured framework for batch processing plan tasks, running verifications, and waiting for review before continuing. Prevents mistakes from rushing through multi-step plans.
actual_capabilities: Read and load implementation plan files from disk
Create structured todo batches for step-by-step execution
Execute tasks in batches (default 3) with verification checkpoints
Report progress and wait for human feedback between batches
Stop and ask for help when hitting blockers or unclear instructions
limitations: Requires a pre-written plan file to execute
Cannot proceed without human feedback between batches
Does not create plans - only executes existing ones
Not suitable for exploratory or ad-hoc tasks without plans

use_cases.title: Feature Implementation
use_cases.description: Follow detailed feature specs, implement in batches, get architect approval between phases

use_cases.title: Complex Refactoring
use_cases.description: Execute multi-phase refactoring plans with safety checkpoints for team review

use_cases.title: Infrastructure Changes
use_cases.description: Roll out infrastructure changes incrementally with verification between batches

prompt_templates.title: Load Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Load the implementation plan from plan.md and review it critically. If you have any concerns, raise them now before we start. Otherwise, create a todo list and begin executing the first batch of 3 tasks.

prompt_templates.title: Report Progress
prompt_templates.prompt: The current batch is complete. Report what was implemented, show verification output, and indicate you are ready for feedback before continuing.

prompt_templates.title: Continue Execution
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the requested changes. Then execute the next batch of 3 tasks from the plan. Continue until the batch is complete, then report for review.

prompt_templates.title: Complete Work
prompt_templates.prompt: All tasks from the plan are complete and verified. Use the finishing-a-development-branch skill to finalize this work properly.

best_practices: Always wait for human feedback before starting the next batch
Run verifications after each task, not just at batch end
Stop immediately and ask for clarification when instructions are unclear
anti_patterns: Continuing past a blocker instead of asking for help
Skipping verification steps to speed up progress
Making assumptions when the plan is unclear

faq.question: What tools does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude Code and standard Claude. It is designed for AI coding assistants that can read files and manage todo lists.

faq.question: How many tasks per batch?
faq.answer: The default is 3 tasks per batch. Adjust based on task complexity and plan requirements.

faq.question: Can I use this with other skills?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill references finishing-a-development-branch for final completion. Chain other skills as your plan specifies.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads plan files and executes tasks you specify. No data is sent anywhere. All execution stays local.

faq.question: What if verification fails?
faq.answer: Stop immediately and report the failure. Do not continue to the next task. Ask for guidance on how to proceed.

faq.question: How is this different from working normally?
faq.answer: This skill enforces disciplined batch execution with mandatory checkpoints. Prevents rushing and ensures human oversight between work batches.
